name: Hard Multiple Marriages Quiz / Test | Celebrities Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Mickey Rooney was married several times. Which of the following was one of his wives?
questions.explanation:
Ava Gardner.

	I think he has had eight marriages. Ava is the most famous; she was also married to Frank Sinatra.

questions.text: Elizabeth Taylor also had several marriages. Which of these is one of her husbands?
questions.explanation:
Michael Wilding.

	Richard Burton and Eddie Fisher are the most famous, but there were a few others - including Wilding.

questions.text: Bette Davis was a bride four times. Which one of the following was one of her husbands?
questions.explanation:
Gary Merrill.

	The romance began when both appeared in 'All About Eve'.

questions.text: Bette's arch rival, Joan Crawford, also had several husbands. Which of the following was one of them?
questions.explanation:
Franchot Tone.

	Tone is best known for 'Mutiny on the Bounty' with Gable. Crawford also married a kingpin at Pepsi-Cola.

questions.text: Jill St. John had many husbands. Which of the following was one of them?
questions.explanation:
Jack Jones.

	That would make them Jack and Jill Jones.

questions.text: George Sanders had many wives. Which of these was one of them?
questions.explanation:
Zsa Zsa Gabor.

	He also married her sister.

questions.text: This woman has written about her eight husbands and nine marriages.
questions.explanation:
Jennifer O'Neill.

	'Surviving Myself' is her recent autobiography.

questions.text: Zsa Zsa Gabor was married to many people - it seems to be what she's best known for. Which of these was one of her husbands?
questions.explanation:
Conrad Hilton.

	Hilton was the father of Nickie Hilton, the first husband of Liz Taylor. Warner was also married to Taylor. Previn was married to Mia Farrow (who was also married to Frank Sinatra). Shaw was married to Lana Turner. Got it?

questions.text: Joan Collins had a few husbands. Which of these was one of them?
Gloria Swanson had six or seven marriages. Who was her first husband?

Wallace Beery.
